STEP1_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your name and a valid email address, so we can send you the code for your SenseBox.
STEP2_DESCRIPTION: Please enter additional data about your SenseBox.
STEP3_DESCRIPTION: Choose the location, where your will mount your SenseBox.
STEP4_DESCRIPTION: Choose the type of your SenseBox.
STEP5_DESCRIPTION: To finish the registration of your SenseBox, click 'Save'. You will receive an email with instructions and the code you have to put on your SenseBox.
